title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XII, pt. 4000 - Procedural Rules
content:

§ 4000.1 - Definitions
§ 4000.2 - Representation of requester

§ 4000.7 - Miscellaneous provisions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XII, pt. 4000

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§170, 171, 207-b, 219-a, 219-e
e, 219-qq, 219-zz, 251,260, 279-a, 280, 283, 288, 289-c, 295, 315, 430, 434, 478, 480, 502, 503-a, 510, 681, 689, 697, 1007, 1081, 1089, 1096, 1132, 1134, 1137, 1138, 1139, 1142, 1250, 1312, 1342, 1444, 1445, 1448, 1468, 1519; General

City Law, § 25-n; Administrative Code of the City of New York, §§ 11-1940, 11-1943, 11-1797, 17- 1797; Codes and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §§
11-1940, 11-1943, 11- 1797, 17-1797; Code and Ordinances of the City of

Yonkers, §§ 92-92, 92-113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
